title: Arshad Azad
text:
I am an Economist1 but this page is mostly about the tools and cool things I come across.
These days I am interested in:

WebR: Magic that runs R in your Browser.

nice documentation
a demo by ever amazing DJ Navarro

API discovery2

a demo describing how I go about it

Cool packages to work with Big (ish) data sets:- fst, arrow

title: webR CSV Demo
text: This example loads demo.csv from the data folder, injects it into webR’s in-browser filesystem, and runs R code on it.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe with webR
text:
You are X. AI is O.


# Load the game logic and set up the board
source("./tictactoe.R")
